topics.body:
*What people think about Greek mythology:*
!http://cdnvideo.dolimg.com/cdn_assets/c0dfd16707086c845deec4d60751352d298611b7.jpg!

*The truth:*
!https://33.media.tumblr.com/36d57284474124621f15d4df596d8d53/tumblr_ncl1ghdY8b1qzag1wo1_500.png!

And no, I don't hate Disney's Hercules. I do like that movie, and I've seen it many times in my life. But I can see why people will tend to prefer the clean version of Greek mythology rather than the authentic version. Heck, try reading a kid's Bible, and then the actual Bible.
